entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.

entry.title: Monday night: Showers or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
